sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_app_template_output_var</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Generate Safe Output Variable Name</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
// If the name is changed for any reason a info message will be displayed to the user, as well as, logged. var templateAPI = new sn_templates.TemplateScriptableAPI(); var cleanVarName = templateAPI.generateCleanFlowVariableName(current.name);
if (cleanVarName !== current.getValue('name')) { // Inform the user that a change in the variable name was made. var infoMessage = gs.getMessage("Template Output Variable name was modified. New name: '{0}', previous name: '{1}'", [cleanVarName, current.name]); gs.addInfoMessage(infoMessage);
// Set the name to be the clean variable name. current.name = cleanVarName; }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 22:43:41</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>1f101c740f1020108c9c5019c4767e32</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Generate Safe Output Variable Name</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Application Templates" source="com.snc.apps_templates">1c2afca83cf1311068bcf327dfe37fff</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_1f101c740f1020108c9c5019c4767e32</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-03-09 18:47:44</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1f101c740f1020108c9c5019c4767e32"/> </record_update>
